bloodmoney.author: GamePlayer
bloodmoney.content: Amazing psychological horror game! The moral dilemma really hits hard. Harvey's reactions are so realistic and make you question your choices.

replies.author: HorrorFan
replies.content: I agree! The way his personality changes as you progress is brilliant game design.

bloodmoney.author: EthicsGamer
bloodmoney.content: This game made me think about real-world moral decisions. Simple mechanics but deep meaning.

bloodmoney.author: UXReviewer
bloodmoney.content: Sidebar test: form fields should be full width and the textarea comfortable for longer thoughts. Actions should be compact.

bloodmoney.author: Designer
bloodmoney.content: Longer sample comment to validate wrapping and spacing. The text should not overflow; it should wrap and keep readable line-height within the 360px sidebar card. Looks good now.

bloodmoney2.author: SequelLover
bloodmoney2.content: The sequel is even more intense! 50+ methods and enhanced psychological consequences. Brilliant evolution of the original concept.

the-baby-in-yellow.author: CreepyGamer
the-baby-in-yellow.content: That baby is terrifying! The atmosphere and sound design are top-notch horror.

buckshot-roulette.author: RouletteFan
buckshot-roulette.content: Nerve-wracking tension! Every decision could be your last. Perfect blend of strategy and luck.

granny-horror.author: SurvivalPlayer
granny-horror.content: Classic horror survival! Granny's AI is unpredictable and keeps you on edge throughout the game.

thats-not-my-neighbor.author: MysteryFan
thats-not-my-neighbor.content: Love the detective work required! Figuring out who's real and who's fake is addictive.
